title: All The Crown's Shadows
description: Kill or be killed. But what if surviving means sacrificing your soul?Hundreds of years have passed since the gods abandoned Aslan. Since then, magic has been all but extinct.That’s what Ruby thinks, anyway.When she is kidnapped by the king’s men and forced to fight for her life, Ruby can’t help but notice the gods interfering with destiny.Something much greater, much darker lies within the walls of the Capital. Will she survive long enough to discover the truth about the evil in Aslan?With unexpected help from the young, mysterious prince, Ruby may finally achieve the one thing her heart longs for the most: Revenge.Dive into this action-packed beginning of The Wicked Flames Saga, and follow Ruby as she learns about love, life, and sacrifices.
author: Emily     Rose
